name: James Beasey
about: Sophomore at Miami University's Farmer School of Business, majoring in Marketing. Skilled in Python, SQL, and creative problem-solving, with a passion for using design to provide innovative solutions. Experienced in customer service, project management, and branding through roles at Valvoline Inc. and Otto Printing Inc.

experience.title: Senior Technician
experience.description: Ensured positive customer experiences by leveraging product expertise, improving workflow, and resolving customer concerns effectively.

experience.title: Undergraduate Assistant
experience.description: Assisted students with assignments, provided feedback, and supported the professor during lessons by organizing attendance and lesson materials.

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: Managed leads and existing business, produced accurate invoices, and ensured solutions aligned with customer needs.

experience.title: Branding Project Lead
experience.description: Designed branding for the club's swim team, managed project milestones, and developed a timeless branding strategy.
